recipe.title: Blackberry Sorbet
ingredients: 2 pints fresh blackberries or 24 ounces frozen unsweetened blackberries, thawed
instructions: 1. Puree the blackberries with 1/4 cup of the sugar syrup in a food processor until smooth. If desired, this mixture can be strained into a bowl to remove the seeds, but it is not necessary. 2. Stir in the remaining sugar syrup, then transfer to an ice cream maker and freeze according to the manufacturer's instructions.
